13  package net.sf.oval.localization.context;
14  
15  import java.util.Enumeration;
16  import java.util.MissingResourceException;
17  import java.util.ResourceBundle;
18  
19  import net.sf.oval.context.ClassContext;
20  import net.sf.oval.context.ConstructorParameterContext;
21  import net.sf.oval.context.FieldContext;
22  import net.sf.oval.context.MethodEntryContext;
23  import net.sf.oval.context.MethodExitContext;
24  import net.sf.oval.context.MethodParameterContext;
25  import net.sf.oval.context.MethodReturnValueContext;
26  import net.sf.oval.context.OValContext;
27  import net.sf.oval.internal.Log;
28  
29  /**
30   * This renderer searches for a resource file that is in the same package and has the same name as the validated class.
31   * It then tries to lookup a localized version of the validation context, e.g.<br>
32   * <b>com.acme.model.Person.java<br>
33   * com.acme.model.Person.properties<br>
34   * com.acme.model.Person_de.properties<br>
35   * com.acme.model.Person_fr.properties</b>
36   * 
37   * <p>
38   * The properties file is expected to have values following this scheme
39   * <pre>
40   * label.class=My translated name of the class name
41   * label.field.firstname=My translated name of the field "firstname"
42   * label.field.lastname=My translated name of the field "lastname"
43   * label.parameter.amount=My translated name of a constructor/method parameter "amount"
44   * label.method.increase=My translated name of the method "increase"
45   * </pre>
46   * @author Sebastian Thomschke
47   */
48  public class ResourceBundleValidationContextRenderer implements OValContextRenderer
49  {
50  	private static final Log  LOG = Log.getLog(ResourceBundleValidationContextRenderer.class);
51  
52  	public static final ResourceBundleValidationContextRenderer INSTANCE = new ResourceBundleValidationContextRenderer();
53  
54  	private boolean containsKey(final ResourceBundle bundle, final String key)
55  	{
56  		for (final Enumeration<String> en = bundle.getKeys(); en.hasMoreElements();)
57  		{
58  			if (en.nextElement().equals(key)) return true;
59  		}
60  		return false;
61  	}
62  
63  	/**
64  	 * {@inheritDoc}
65  	 */
66  	public String render(final OValContext ovalContext)
67  	{
68  		final String baseName;
69  		final String key;
70  		if (ovalContext instanceof ClassContext)
71  		{
72  			final ClassContext ctx = (ClassContext) ovalContext;
73  			baseName = ctx.getClazz().getName();
74  			key = "label.class";
75  		}
76  		else if (ovalContext instanceof FieldContext)
77  		{
78  			final FieldContext ctx = (FieldContext) ovalContext;
79  			baseName = ctx.getField().getDeclaringClass().getName();
80  			final String fieldName = ctx.getField().getName();
81  			key = "label.field." + fieldName;
82  		}
83  		else if (ovalContext instanceof ConstructorParameterContext)
84  		{
85  			final ConstructorParameterContext ctx = (ConstructorParameterContext) ovalContext;
86  			baseName = ctx.getConstructor().getDeclaringClass().getName();
87  			key = "label.parameter." + ctx.getParameterName();
88  		}
89  		else if (ovalContext instanceof MethodParameterContext)
90  		{
91  			final MethodParameterContext ctx = (MethodParameterContext) ovalContext;
92  			baseName = ctx.getMethod().getDeclaringClass().getName();
93  			key = "label.parameter." + ctx.getParameterName();
94  		}
95  		else if (ovalContext instanceof MethodEntryContext)
96  		{
97  			final MethodEntryContext ctx = (MethodEntryContext) ovalContext;
98  			baseName = ctx.getMethod().getDeclaringClass().getName();
99  			key = "label.method." + ctx.getMethod().getName();
100 		}
101 		else if (ovalContext instanceof MethodExitContext)
102 		{
103 			final MethodExitContext ctx = (MethodExitContext) ovalContext;
104 			baseName = ctx.getMethod().getDeclaringClass().getName();
105 			key = "label.method." + ctx.getMethod().getName();
106 		}
107 		else if (ovalContext instanceof MethodReturnValueContext)
108 		{
109 			final MethodReturnValueContext ctx = (MethodReturnValueContext) ovalContext;
110 			baseName = ctx.getMethod().getDeclaringClass().getName();
111 			key = "label.method." + ctx.getMethod().getName();
112 		}
113 		else
114 			return ovalContext.toString();
115 
116 		try
117 		{
118 			final ResourceBundle bundle = ResourceBundle.getBundle(baseName);
119 			if (containsKey(bundle, key)) return bundle.getString(key);
120 			LOG.debug("Key {1} not found in bundle {2}", key, baseName);
121 		}
122 		catch (final MissingResourceException ex)
123 		{
124 			LOG.debug("Bundle {1} not found", baseName, ex);
125 		}
126 		return ovalContext.toString();
127 	}
128 }
